arts.ttl: Turkey vs Georgia Broadcast – Time and Channel to Watch the Match
arts.sum: Georgia will face Turkey this Tuesday at 8:45 PM. CET. It will be at the Turka Kocaeli Stadium as part of the 2026 World Cup qualifiers. One Paris Saint-Germain player is affected by this match, on the Georgian side: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (24-year-old forward). Find information about the broadcast of this Turkey vs. Georgia match here. […]
